name: YouTube - Like / DIslike / Download colors [DLYT]
description: Saijin_Naib's like / dislike buttons and rating bar colors, with classes for the Download menu button provided by JS-turned-featured addon Download YouTube Videos as MP4
additional_info: Imformation This style was made mainly for Download YouTube Videos as MP4, but it is by no means mandatory. The Download button aura is already enabled in here, all one needs to do is install the addon to see it. While Saijin's style uses straight red and green, I decided to hold steadfast to YouTube's schema and use the like bar color for like, seekbar elapsed color for dislike and some green color for download. I could not discern if YouTube ever uses green on their website anymore, information about the green color they use would be nice to update the style with. Known bugs The addon doesn't fully replicate YouTube's button behavior, forcing me to specify a lighter colors for normal, then full color on hover. Bear this in mind when editing the style. Changelog Post-release I tried to tweak with text colors for download button, whatever, it works. Also to be different (sorry if this messes up int'l YouTube sites or style with RTL formatting), I moved the position of the "Dislike" button farther away from the "Like" button.
